name: Island Hoppers (8BitMe, yanin, kevinkerrmusic)
description:
Island Hoppers is a platformer game,  of a girl who has fructophobia and goes on rampage of destroying every fruit on her path.   

Controls:
Click and Drag the Left Mouse Button to dash/slide/jump

Tip: Keep dashing through enemies & flowers to maintain /increase speed!

Level Order: If you're having problems completing level 3, skip to 4! We didn't order the levels right! Also, down-slide!

a game made for #BoundlessGameJam
